# Benchmark Equipment Rental & Sales

## Company Overview
Benchmark Equipment is a heavy equipment rental and sales company headquartered in Denton, Texas. Founded by Tyler McClain, the company specializes in providing reliable, late-model Cat (Caterpillar) construction equipment to contractors across North Texas and surrounding states.

## Services
- Heavy equipment rental (daily, weekly, monthly)
- Equipment sales (new and used)
- Equipment delivery and logistics (nationwide)
- Jobsite consultation and equipment selection
- Maintenance and service support

## Equipment Types
- Excavators (mini to full-size, including Cat 336)
- Skid Steers and Compact Track Loaders
- Wheel Loaders
- Articulated Dump Trucks (Cat 730, Cat 745)
- Dozers
- Rollers and Compactors
- Water Trucks
- Off-Road Trucks

## Location
3310 Fort Worth Dr, Denton, TX 76205
Phone: (817) 403-4334
Email: info@benchmarkequip.com
Website: https://benchmarkequip.com

## Service Area
Primary: Denton, Dallas, Fort Worth, McKinney, Frisco, Arlington, and the greater DFW metroplex
Extended: Texas, Oklahoma, Arkansas, Louisiana, and nationwide delivery available

## Business Hours
Monday - Friday: 7:00 AM - 5:00 PM CST
After-hours coordination available for deliveries

## Key Differentiators
- Locally owned, relationship-driven service
- Direct communication with decision-makers (no call centers)
- Late-model, low-hour Cat equipment
- Strict maintenance and inspection schedules
- 24-48 hour delivery in DFW area
- Flexible rental terms
- Rent-to-own options available

## Industries Served
- Commercial construction
- Civil contracting
- Utilities and pipeline
- Road and infrastructure
- Site development
- Residential development
